name: <core_simd::vector::Simd<f64, N> as core_simd::simd::num::float::SimdFloat>::signum

core_simd::simd::num::float::SimdFloat::.doc: Returns true for each element if its value is `NaN`.

Returns each element with the magnitude of `self` and the sign of `sign`.

 For any element containing a `NAN`, a `NAN` with the sign of `sign` is returned.
